content:
Keryx Notification Service: Basic concepts

  • Publication

    • Declare an intention to send notifications
    • Describe notification types

  • Subscription

    • Register interest in receiving notifications
    • Register notification filter

  • Notifications

    • Fine-grained information packages
    • Describe an event
    • Suited for automatic processing
    • Undirected

  • Propagation

    • Supporting servers send notifications to end-users
    • Propagate only if interest exists (filters)
